title: Get Microsoft Office Home & Business 2019 for Mac, just $24.97

excerpt: Get lifetime access to Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019 for Mac, with Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote and Teams Classic.
text: Daily deals Enjoy all of Microsoft Office 2019 on any Mac for less than $25. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals There comes a time in nearly every adult’s life when you must install Microsoft Office. Yes, you can technically get by without Word, Excel and the other essentials. But if you want to get certain tasks done on your killer Mac setup, you’ll need these tools. And this limited-time deal on Microsoft Office Home & Business 2019 for Mac might be the time to get them. For a limited time, you can get yourself or a fellow Mac user lifetime access to Microsoft Office for Mac for only $24.97 (regularly $229). Microsoft’s top-rated Office productivity apps for Mac It’s worth pointing out that this is Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019, not the rebranded, cloud-based package included with Microsoft 365. While this is an older version, your purchase of this license means you can say goodbye to subscription fees and other recurring annoyances. Ideal for home users, families and small businesses, this software suite includes the following productivity apps: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote and Teams Classic. Whether you’re drafting a budget, creating presentations for work, or need a reliable word processing program, MS Office can help. The software suite works on these versions of macOS For successful installation, users must be running one of the three most recent versions of macOS: macOS Monterey (version 12) macOS Ventura (version 13) Or macOS Sonoma (version 14) Buyers will enjoy instant delivery and download after their purchase, with lifetime updates to their MS Office license. html:
• Daily deals

There comes a time in nearly every adult’s life when you must install Microsoft Office. Yes, you can technically get by without Word, Excel and the other essentials. But if you want to get certain tasks done on your killer Mac setup, you’ll need these tools. And this limited-time deal on Microsoft Office Home & Business 2019 for Mac might be the time to get them.

For a limited time, you can get yourself or a fellow Mac user lifetime access to Microsoft Office for Mac for only $24.97 (regularly $229).

Microsoft’s top-rated Office productivity apps for Mac

It’s worth pointing out that this is Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019, not the rebranded, cloud-based package included with Microsoft 365. While this is an older version, your purchase of this license means you can say goodbye to subscription fees and other recurring annoyances.

Ideal for home users, families and small businesses, this software suite includes the following productivity apps: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote and Teams Classic.

Whether you’re drafting a budget, creating presentations for work, or need a reliable word processing program, MS Office can help.

The software suite works on these versions of macOS

For successful installation, users must be running one of the three most recent versions of macOS:

  • macOS Monterey (version 12)
  • macOS Ventura (version 13)
  • Or macOS Sonoma (version 14)

Buyers will enjoy instant delivery and download after their purchase, with lifetime updates to their MS Office license.

Save on Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019 for Mac

Secure a lifetime of enhanced productivity with lifetime access to Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019 for Mac for just $24.97.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackCommerce, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this deals post on Microsoft Office for Mac on December 11, 2023. We updated the pricing info.
